entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lytton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lytton 06:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.9°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -21.0°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Periods of freezing rain near Boston Bar in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
